Title: Monsters University
Writer: Dan Scanlon, Daniel Gerson, Robert L. Baird
Actors: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Steve Buscemi
Plot: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski and James P. "Sully" Sullivan during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.
Awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA 9 wins & 58 nominations total
